channel.title: Who-to-Use on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Who-to-Use on Ksbigbass

item.title: Dead or Blown Powerhead
item.description:
Dead or Blown Powerhead: It has happened again.

Optimax blew up.

Dead and blown powerhead: So many of us have been there. Whether or not we get a warning buzzer that tells us or just a gut feeling, we all know when we’ve blown up another outboard motor.

item.title: Become a PAA Observer, win some free stuff.
item.description:
Become a PAA Observer, win some free stuff.

PAA is always having tournaments and looking for official observers to participate in the tournaments. This is a chance to land some free gear!

Plus watch some awesome pro bass fisherman practice.

Why You would Do this?

Learn new tips not available to the general public straight from the pros as they’re using the technique.

https://youtu.be/1m-CRHHw9Eo

Home of the Professional Anglers Association: PAA

item.title: OMG! Smallie!!!!
item.description: OMG! Smallie!!!! Was lucky enough to film an incredible smallie show this past week where we had several fish over 6 lbs and 5 fish we weighed over 5 lbs on a digital scale, all on a variety of baits from jerkbaits, jigs, cranks, and lipless cranks.
